And it came to pass after \w this|strong="H0310"\w*, that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall I go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*? And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Whither shall I go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Unto \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thither, and his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* also, \w Ahinoam|strong="H0293"\w* the \w Jezreelitess|strong="H3159"\w*, and \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* \w Nabal’s|strong="H5037"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* the \w Carmelite|strong="H3761"\w*.

And his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \add were\add* with him did \w David|strong="H1732"\w* bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w household|strong="H1004"\w*: and they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and there they \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. And they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \add That\add* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* \add were they\add* that \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* ye of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that ye have \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w* this \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* unto your \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and have \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him.

And now the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* unto you: and I also will \w requite|strong="H6213"\w* you this \w kindness|strong="H2896"\w*, because ye have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

Therefore now let your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* be \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w*, and be ye \w valiant|strong="H1121"\w*: for your \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, and also the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* have \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* me \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over them.\f + \fr 2.7 \ft be ye…: Heb. be ye the sons of valour\f*

¶ But \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and brought him \w over|strong="H5674"\w* to \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w*;\f + \fr 2.8 \ft Saul’s host: Heb. the host which was Saul’s\f*\f + \fr 2.8 \ft Ish-bosheth: or, Esh-baal\f*

And made him \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and over the \w Ashurites|strong="H0805"\w*, and over \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, and over \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and over \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w* \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. But the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And the \w time|strong="H4557"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* over the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* was \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*.\f + \fr 2.11 \ft time: Heb. number of days\f*

¶ And \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, and the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w* to \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*.

And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, and the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w met|strong="H6298"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* by the \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*: and they sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w*, the one on the one side of the \w pool|strong="H1295"\w*, and the other on the other side of the \w pool|strong="H1295"\w*.\f + \fr 2.13 \ft together: Heb. them together\f*

And \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, Let the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* now \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w play|strong="H7832"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us. And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let them \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*.

Then there \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* by \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, which \add pertained\add* to \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* of the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And they \w caught|strong="H2388"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his \w fellow|strong="H7453"\w* by the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \add thrust\add* his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in his \w fellow’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*; so they fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: wherefore that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* was \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Helkath-hazzurim|strong="H2521"\w*, which \add is\add* in \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft Helkath-hazzurim: that is, The field of strong men\f*

And there was a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w sore|strong="H7186"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; and \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* was \w beaten|strong="H5062"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

¶ And there were \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* there, \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, and \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w*, and \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w*: and \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* \add was as\add* \w light|strong="H7031"\w* of \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* as \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w roe|strong="H6643"\w*.\f + \fr 2.18 \ft of foot: Heb. of his feet\f*\f + \fr 2.18 \ft as a wild…: Heb. as one of the roes that is in the field\f*

And \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*; and in \w going|strong="H3212"\w* he \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* not to the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* nor to the \w left|strong="H8040"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*.\f + \fr 2.19 \ft from…: Heb. from after Abner\f*

Then \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Art\add* thou \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add*.

And \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to him, Turn thee \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* to thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* or to thy \w left|strong="H8040"\w*, and lay thee \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* on \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee his \w armour|strong="H2488"\w*. But \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not turn \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* of him.\f + \fr 2.21 \ft armour: or, spoil\f*

And \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* to \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w*, Turn thee \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* me: wherefore should I \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* thee to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*? how then should I hold \w up|strong="H5375"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*?

Howbeit he \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to turn \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*: wherefore \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* with the hinder \w end|strong="H0310"\w* of the \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him \w under|strong="H0413"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2570"\w* \add rib\add*, that the \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* him; and he fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* there, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in the same \w place|strong="H8478"\w*: and it came to pass, \add that\add* as many as \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* and \w died|strong="H4191"\w* stood \w still|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* also and \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*: and the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* went \w down|strong="H0935"\w* when they were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* of \w Ammah|strong="H0522"\w*, that \add lieth\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Giah|strong="H1520"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*, and became \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w troop|strong="H0092"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* on the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of an \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*.

Then \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* to \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*? \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* thou not that it will be \w bitterness|strong="H4751"\w* in the latter \w end|strong="H0314"\w*? how long shall it be then, ere thou \w bid|strong="H0559"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*?

And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, \w unless|strong="H3884"\w* thou hadst \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, surely then in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* had gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.\f + \fr 2.27 \ft in the…: Heb. from the morning\f*\f + \fr 2.27 \ft gone…: or, gone away\f*

So \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* stood \w still|strong="H5975"\w*, and \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* no more, neither \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* they any \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

And \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* all that \w night|strong="H3915"\w* through the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*, and passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and went \w through|strong="H3212"\w* all \w Bithron|strong="H1338"\w*, and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w*.

And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*: and when he had \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, there \w lacked|strong="H6485"\w* of \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w nineteen|strong="H8672"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* and \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w*.

But the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and of \w Abner’s|strong="H0074"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \add so that\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And they took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w*, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in the \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, which \add was in\add* \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*. And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* all \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and they came to \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* at break of \w day|strong="H0215"\w*.
